mountain.entrance_message: You begin climbing the steep mountain path. The air grows thinner as you ascend.

events.name: find_herbs
events.message: You discover some rare medicinal herbs growing on a rocky ledge!

events.name: meet_hermit
events.message: You encounter a wise hermit living in a small cave.

events.name: difficult_climb
events.message: The climb becomes treacherous. You slip and get scraped.

events.name: beautiful_view
events.message: You reach a scenic overlook with a breathtaking view of the valley below.

search_for_minerals.name: Search for minerals
search_for_minerals.description: Look for valuable stones and minerals
search_for_minerals.message: You search the rocky outcroppings for valuable minerals.

events.name: find_crystal
events.message: You find a beautiful crystal formation!

events.name: find_ancient_coin
events.message: You discover an ancient coin embedded in the rock!

events.name: nothing_valuable
events.message: You don't find anything particularly valuable.

use_rope.name: Use rope (if you have one)
use_rope.description: Use rope to access difficult areas

with_rope.message: You secure your rope and access a previously unreachable ledge.

events.name: hidden_treasure
events.message: You find a hidden cache of treasure!

events.name: safe_passage
events.message: The rope allows you to navigate safely.

without_rope.message: You need a rope to safely access the higher ledges.

rest_on_ledge.name: Rest on a ledge
rest_on_ledge.description: Take a break on a mountain ledge
rest_on_ledge.message: You find a comfortable ledge and rest for a while.

effects.message: The mountain air is refreshing and helps you recover.

talk_to_hermit.name: Talk to hermit (if present)
talk_to_hermit.message: The hermit shares ancient wisdom with you.

events.name: receive_blessing
events.message: The hermit gives you a mystical blessing!

events.name: wise_advice
events.message: The hermit offers you valuable advice about your journey.
